comments.comment: HSG test means -An HSG is a special kind of x-ray used to evaluate female fertility. An outpatient procedure, the¬†testtakes no longer than a half hour. It involves placing an iodine-based dye through the cervix and taking x-rays. These x-rays help evaluate the shape of the uterus and whether the fallopian tubes are blocked.
